item.title: Here’s how to hold crypto in your 401(k) right now, without waiting for your employer to come around
item.description: Crypto is headed to inclusion in retirement plans — if it can get past company plan sponsors.

item.title: Pfizer’s stock drops after drug giant lowers its revenue forecast
item.description: The pharmaceutical company updated its sales guidance for 2025, saying it now expects $62 billion in revenue for the year.

item.title: Gen Z would rather cut Social Security benefits for current retirees than pay higher taxes to save the program
item.description: There’s a stark generational divide in how to solve the Social Security crisis.
